content.heading: concreteai.io
content.description: Create an app to monitor and manage the status of the concrete mixing
paragraphs: ConcreteAI is a startup company that provides a solution to monitor and manage the status of the concrete mixing.
Develops a web app that helps users to monitor and manage the status of the concrete mixing.
Develops a microservice system to manage the core API. It's built on NodeJs, Golang.
Packaging the app into different environment to adapt business model.
